[ library(ic) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

?ExprX #> ?ExprY

ExprX is strictly greater than ExprY (with integrality constraints).
ExprX
Integer arithmetic expression
ExprY
Integer arithmetic expression

Description

Constrains ExprX to be greater than ExprY. Also constrains all variables appearing in ExprX and ExprY to be integral and checks that all constants are integers.

See Also

#< / 2, #=< / 2, #= / 2, #>= / 2, #\= / 2, > / 2, #> / 3, suspend : #> / 2, fd : #> / 2
